solution_line_template: Mike is using {bricks_type_A} blocks / {half_divisor} = <<{bricks_type_A}/{half_divisor}={bricks_type_B}>>{bricks_type_B} blocks of type B.
He uses in total {bricks_type_A} blocks + {bricks_type_B} blocks = <<{bricks_type_A}+{bricks_type_B}={total_bricks_A_B}>>{total_bricks_A_B} blocks of type A and B.
So he is going to use {total_bricks_needed} blocks - {total_bricks_A_B} blocks = <<{total_bricks_needed}-{total_bricks_A_B}={other_types_bricks}>>{other_types_bricks} blocks of other types.
